General.Name: Spruce Power Holding Corp
General.Description: Spruce Power Holding Corporation owns and operates distributed solar energy assets in the United States. The company provides subscription-based services for homeowners and small businesses to own and maintain rooftop solar and battery storage. It offers its subscription-based services to approximately 72,000 customers. The company is headquartered in Denver, Colorado.
General.Address: 145 Newton Street, Boston, MA, United States, 02135
